message.content:
1. An assessment was conducted.
2. The assessment was done on subjective parameters.
3. The assessment was done on objective parameters.
4. The assessment was conducted after 30 days of treatment.
5. The assessment was conducted after 60 days of treatment.
6. There was a follow-up after two months of treatment.

messages.content:
Statement: Assessment was done on subjective and objective parameters after 30 and 60 days of treatment with follow up of two month.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
